data.text:
A day off. Accompanying Fine Motion as her guardian, the two of 
us headed to the mountain behind the school.
data.processed:
<story>A day off. Accompanying Fine Motion as her guardian, the two of 
<story>us headed to the mountain behind the school.

data.text:
Fuu… haa! Yeah, the forest air is refreshing, isn't it? 
The smell reminds me of the morning dew in my garden.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Fuu… haa! Yeah, the forest air is refreshing, isn't it? 
<story>The smell reminds me of the morning dew in my garden.

data.text:
"…well then, Trainer-sama. Sorry to impose upon you but, in 
regards to Her Highness, you have my sincere thanks."
data.name: SP Commander (phone)
data.processed:
<story>"…well then, Trainer-sama. Sorry to impose upon you but, in 
<story>regards to Her Highness, you have my sincere thanks."

data.text:
Fufufu, thank you, Trainer. It's precisely because I'm with you 
that I was able to have some free time and come here.
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: By the way, where are we headed?

data.processed:
<story>Fufufu, thank you, Trainer. It's precisely because I'm with you 
<story>that I was able to have some free time and come here.

data.text:
Oh! That's a great question, isn't it? 
Fufufu, you see, today-
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Oh! That's a great question, isn't it? 
<story>Fufufu, you see, today-

data.text:
…there isn't really a destination! It's just 
that I thought it would be lovely to take a walk 
with you surrounded by nature like this.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>…there isn't really a destination! It's just 
<story>that I thought it would be lovely to take a walk 
<story>with you surrounded by nature like this.

data.text:
Well, but… you see? 
You never know, something special might happen, perhaps.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Well, but… you see? 
<story>You never know, something special might happen, perhaps.

data.text:
She definitely seems to be hiding something, but 
let's leave that aside for now. Let's just keep 
walking together with Fine Motion, mindlessly-
data.processed:
<story>She definitely seems to be hiding something, but 
<story>let's leave that aside for now. Let's just keep 
<story>walking together with Fine Motion, mindlessly-

data.text:
-Fuu, thanks for the meal. Yep, the quality of this Deluxe Cold 
Noodle Bentou is quite good, if I do say so myself.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>-Fuu, thanks for the meal. Yep, the quality of this Deluxe Cold 
<story>Noodle Bentou is quite good, if I do say so myself.

data.text:
That's true. All we can hear are the sound of this small river, 
birds, and insects… it's like we're in a strange new world.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>That's true. All we can hear are the sound of this small river, 
<story>birds, and insects… it's like we're in a strange new world.

data.text:
…it kind of reminds me of a story from my childhood. 
The scene where the hero and the kidnapped princess 
escape through the forest…
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>…it kind of reminds me of a story from my childhood. 
<story>The scene where the hero and the kidnapped princess 
<story>escape through the forest…

data.text:
And then, the fearsome dragon comes to take back the princess, 
suddenly attacking. They were deep in the forest, just like us.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>And then, the fearsome dragon comes to take back the princess, 
<story>suddenly attacking. They were deep in the forest, just like us.

data.text:
…Fufu. It almost feels like, a dragon 
could appear at any moment.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>…Fufu. It almost feels like, a dragon 
<story>could appear at any moment.

data.text:
But- if it did? If something like that really did happen… 
Would you… protect me?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>But- if it did? If something like that really did happen… 
<story>Would you… protect me?

data.text:
Really?! That makes me happy! 
Aa, somehow that makes me kind of wish a dragon would appear-
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Really?! That makes me happy! 
<story>Aa, somehow that makes me kind of wish a dragon would appear-

data.text: (ROOOOOOOOAR…!)
data.processed: <story>(ROOOOOOOOAR…!)

data.text:
-Ah! Trainer, look! 
From the river…!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>-Ah! Trainer, look! 
<story>From the river…!

data.text: ROOOOOOOOOAR!!!!
data.name: Dragon
data.processed: <story>ROOOOOOOOOAR!!!!

data.text:
What appeared from the water was… something that 
looked like an old drawing of a Tyrannosaurus with 
two wings sitting awkwardly on its back-
data.processed:
<story>What appeared from the water was… something that 
<story>looked like an old drawing of a Tyrannosaurus with 
<story>two wings sitting awkwardly on its back-

data.text:
-It's a dragon! 
Oh no, it's coming right for us!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>-It's a dragon! 
<story>Oh no, it's coming right for us!

data.text:
It might have been my imagination, but its movements seemed 
unnatural or forced… It was even standing there posing with 
its arms in the shape of a cross…
data.processed:
<story>It might have been my imagination, but its movements seemed 
<story>unnatural or forced… It was even standing there posing with 
<story>its arms in the shape of a cross…

data.text:
Aaah! At this rate… just like this… 
It'll turn us in to tasty treats!!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Aaah! At this rate… just like this… 
<story>It'll turn us in to tasty treats!!

data.text:
Uu, won't someone become our hero and 
defeat this fearsome dragon…?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Uu, won't someone become our hero and 
<story>defeat this fearsome dragon…?

data.text: ROOOOAR!!!
data.name: Dragon
data.processed: <story>ROOOOAR!!!

data.text:
Do your best, Hero! 
The glory of victory is in your hands!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Do your best, Hero! 
<story>The glory of victory is in your hands!

data.text:
And so… our not-so-violent scuffle to see who could outlast the 
other began. After 5 to 10 minutes-
data.processed:
<story>And so… our not-so-violent scuffle to see who could outlast the 
<story>other began. After 5 to 10 minutes-

data.text: Guaaaaa…!! You got me…!!
data.name: Dragon
data.processed: <story>Guaaaaa…!! You got me…!!

data.text: Splendid! It was an amazing fight, Trainer!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Splendid! It was an amazing fight, Trainer!

data.text:
But, at that moment. The defeated dragon stood again, and 
abruptly took off its head… wait, took off its head!?
data.processed:
<story>But, at that moment. The defeated dragon stood again, and 
<story>abruptly took off its head… wait, took off its head!?

data.text: Fufufu… Congratulations.
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed: <story>Fufufu… Congratulations.

data.text: Fufu… 1, 2-!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Fufu… 1, 2-!

data.text: You got punk'd!
data.name: Fine & Commander
data.processed: <story>You got punk'd!

data.text: …well, I suspected as much.
data.processed: <story>…well, I suspected as much.

data.text:
Fufufu… a little while ago, 
remember how we returned that lost cat to its owner?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Fufufu… a little while ago, 
<story>remember how we returned that lost cat to its owner?

data.text:
At that time, remember how wonderful it was? 
So I tried preparing something similar for today!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>At that time, remember how wonderful it was? 
<story>So I tried preparing something similar for today!

data.text: …what did you think of our surprise prank?
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: I suppose I was surprised… but it was fun.
choices.processed: <size=39>I suppose I was surprised… but it was fun.</size>

data.processed: <story>…what did you think of our surprise prank?

data.text: That's good! That makes rehearsing it at school worth it!
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>That's good! That makes rehearsing it at school worth it!

data.text:
On top of that, you kept your promise, didn't you? 
When the dragon appeared, you protected me.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>On top of that, you kept your promise, didn't you? 
<story>When the dragon appeared, you protected me.

data.text: …Fufu. Thanks.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>…Fufu. Thanks.

data.text:
After that, the 3 of us continued walking… 
We headed back after we enjoyed the view from the summit.
data.processed:
<story>After that, the 3 of us continued walking… 
<story>We headed back after we enjoyed the view from the summit.

data.text:
-Oh! Welcome, little lady. 
Do you want the usual?
data.name: Extreme Noodle Shopkeeper
data.processed:
<story>-Oh! Welcome, little lady. 
<story>Do you want the usual?

data.text: Yeah, if you don't mind.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>Yeah, if you don't mind.

data.text:
Fuu… it kind of feels like we're home. 
Good work today, both of you.
data.name: Fine Motion

choices.text: Well yeah, there was a battle…
Well yeah, there was a battle…

data.processed:
<story>Fuu… it kind of feels like we're home. 
<story>Good work today, both of you.

data.text:
Fu… I'm used to this. In the past, Her Highness awarded me a 
hand-made medal for my dragon act.
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>Fu… I'm used to this. In the past, Her Highness awarded me a 
<story>hand-made medal for my dragon act.

data.text:
Fufu, that's a nostalgic topic. If I remember correctly, the 
"Worked Hard At Being A Dragon Award". I think I made it from 
flowers, branches, and clovers…
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>Fufu, that's a nostalgic topic. If I remember correctly, the 
<story>"Worked Hard At Being A Dragon Award". I think I made it from 
<story>flowers, branches, and clovers…

data.text:
That's right. In that case I should prepare something for 
Trainer. How does the "Dragon Slayer Cross" sound?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>That's right. In that case I should prepare something for 
<story>Trainer. How does the "Dragon Slayer Cross" sound?

data.text:
Congratulations. But it's still nothing compared 
to the glory of my "Enthusiastic Witch Performance" 
and "Holy Castle Role" medals…
data.name: SP Commander
data.processed:
<story>Congratulations. But it's still nothing compared 
<story>to the glory of my "Enthusiastic Witch Performance" 
<story>and "Holy Castle Role" medals…

data.text: -Order up. 3 lightly salted, large size.
data.name: Extreme Noodle Shopkeeper
data.processed: <story>-Order up. 3 lightly salted, large size.

data.text:
…Huh?! I don't think I ordered corn 
and bamboo shoot as toppings…
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>…Huh?! I don't think I ordered corn 
<story>and bamboo shoot as toppings…

data.text:
Isn't this "The Usual" for you? 
It's on the house today, so just enjoy.
data.name: Extreme Noodle Shopkeeper
data.processed:
<story>Isn't this "The Usual" for you? 
<story>It's on the house today, so just enjoy.

data.text:
! Thank you very much! 
Then, with pleasure.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>! Thank you very much! 
<story>Then, with pleasure.

data.text: …"The usual," huh? Not special, just the usual.
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>…"The usual," huh? Not special, just the usual.

data.text:
-Fufu. At some point, eating ramen and talking with my friends 
like this just became "the usual," didn't it?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>-Fufu. At some point, eating ramen and talking with my friends 
<story>like this just became "the usual," didn't it?

data.text: …For me, it's possible that-
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed: <story>…For me, it's possible that-

data.text:
No, nothing. 
-Today was a really fun day, wasn't it?
data.name: Fine Motion
data.processed:
<story>No, nothing. 
<story>-Today was a really fun day, wasn't it?
